name: Bombs Up
description:
Bombs Up is a remake of minesweeper. Players can choose between two modes in the game; Journey mode, and AI Mode. Journey mode consists of the original minesweeper game with increasing difficulty as the player progresses. This can be in the form of either a bigger board or more bombs. AI mode is where the player is trying to finish as many 10 x 10 boards as they can before the AI manages to finish a 30 x 30 board.

Controls

  • Use Arrow keys to move around the board.
  • Use the E to flag a square with a potential bomb.
  • Use the spacebar to reveal a square.
  • Press Escape to Pause. (Note: You cannot pause in AI Mode)
